Project Description

Kinect: Tower Defence is a 2D tower defence game programmed in C# using the XNA Framework, played on the PC.

It will make use of the Kinect hardware and motion tracking to add more fun to how the game is controlled and played.

Use of the Kinect

The Kinect being used in development is currently a Kinect for Xbox 360 and NOT a Kinect for Windows. It is our intention to get hold of a Kinect for Windows and begin work with that as well as testing with the Kinect for Xbox 360

Prototype Game


The prototype of the game will be based on "Three things" assigned by a third party. The things have been assigned and here is what the team have been awarded:

  1. Word Processor
  2. Fruitcake
  3. Wildcard (can be whatever we want)



This should make for an interesting looking game (available Sunday).
